text: Ischgl is a town in the Paznaun valley in the Austrian state of Tyrol. The ski resort Silvretta Arena Ischgl-Samnaun is connected with the ski resort of Samnaun across the border in Switzerland. Together this ski area belongs to the largest skiing resorts in the Alps. Its 238 km of groomed pistes are served by over 45 mechanical lifts including cable cars, gondolas, detachable chairlifts and some T-bars. title: Ischgl
